argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ressply1.s | |- S = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ressply1.h | |- H = ( R |`s T ) |
| 3 |  | ressply1.u | |- U = ( Poly1 ` H ) |
| 4 |  | ressply1.b | |- B = ( Base ` U ) |
| 5 |  | ressply1.2 | |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | ressply1.p | |- P = ( S |`s B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly R ) = ( 1o mPoly R ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly H ) = ( 1o mPoly H ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( PwSer1 ` H ) = ( PwSer1 ` H ) |
| 10 | 3, 9, 4 | #P_ply1bas | |- B = ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly H ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_1on | |- 1o e. On |
| 12 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> 1o e. On ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( 1o mPoly R ) |`s B ) = ( ( 1o mPoly R ) |`s B ) |
| 14 | 7, 2, 8, 10, 12, 5, 13 | #P_ressmpladd | |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( X ( +g ` ( 1o mPoly H ) ) Y ) = ( X ( +g ` ( ( 1o mPoly R ) |`s B ) ) Y ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` U ) = ( +g ` U ) |
| 16 | 3, 8, 15 | #P_ply1plusg | |- ( +g ` U ) = ( +g ` ( 1o mPoly H ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_oveqi | |- ( X ( +g ` U ) Y ) = ( X ( +g ` ( 1o mPoly H ) ) Y ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` S ) = ( +g ` S ) |
| 19 | 1, 7, 18 | #P_ply1plusg | |- ( +g ` S ) = ( +g ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` U ) e. _V |
| 21 | 4, 20 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 22 | 6, 18 | #P_ressplusg | |- ( B e. _V -> ( +g ` S ) = ( +g ` P ) ) |
| 23 | 21, 22 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( +g ` S ) = ( +g ` P ) |
| 24 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) = ( +g ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 25 | 13, 24 | #P_ressplusg | |- ( B e. _V -> ( +g ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) = ( +g ` ( ( 1o mPoly R ) |`s B ) ) ) |
| 26 | 21, 25 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( +g ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) = ( +g ` ( ( 1o mPoly R ) |`s B ) ) |
| 27 | 19, 23, 26 | #P_3eqtr3i | |- ( +g ` P ) = ( +g ` ( ( 1o mPoly R ) |`s B ) ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_oveqi | |- ( X ( +g ` P ) Y ) = ( X ( +g ` ( ( 1o mPoly R ) |`s B ) ) Y ) |
| 29 | 14, 17, 28 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( X ( +g ` U ) Y ) = ( X ( +g ` P ) Y ) ) |
